overview: Sceneggiata Napoletana is a well made Italian adult film. There's as much fucking as there is plot in this one to satisfy both sexes. The beautiful curvy Selen is the shining star in this film, fucking in threesomes, fivesomes, and hot one on one sex. The film tells the story of a poor fisherman, who, in a dream, is instructed by San Gennaro to play the lottery. After loosing all his savings, in order to pay back the loan taken from a tightfisted usurian, he has no other choice, but to ask his wife to offer up her body as payment and face the humiliating consequences, which eventually lead to her suicide.
title: Neapolitan drama
